name: LGPHY ARCADE
description:
With hopes of attributing to the ever growing technology hub of the south, I have singlehandedly created a one-stop-shop mobile application complete with a provisional patent for automated user uploaded software. Let's Get PHYSICal, LLC™ is the foundation of what will be a technology driven conglomerate based in metro Atlanta.

LGPHY Arcade is a one-stop-shop mobile app that will encompass the future endeavors of all things LGPHY. The app debuts with a retro style 2D side scroller game named after my grandmother, Bethenia's Come Up. With 3 levels in one scene, all random, 40 AI driven enemies, and anti gravity this game allows you to shoot enemies, run on the ceiling, and collect coins and gems all while supporting local small businesses with a total 21 billboard ads on the middle and underworlds. Travel through the teleportals to find your ad! The background music will be sponsored by LGPHY Radio. LGPHY Radio is an application dedicated to independent artists who want to share their music with the world. All ads uploaded are FREE!! All music uploaded is FREE!!
